Rebecca is a 34-year-old merchant who lives in the city of Gitega, located at the center of the country. She has been selling beer for 5 years, and she is also a farmer. She is a member of the DUTERINTAMBWE I community group.

Rebecca attended primary school. She is married with four children, two of whom go to primary school. 

The loan of 100,000 BIF will help to bolster her working capital. She will stock up on cases of beer for resale to make substantial profits.

loans.use: to stock up on cases of beer for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more bags of corn to make banku.

loans.name: Mwatime

texts.en:
Mwatime is a widowed woman with four children, all of whom have graduated from school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is rent.

For the past three years, she has operated a food stall business, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Her major dream is to establish a permanent food stall in the future.

With the KSHS 10,000, she wants to purchase sacks of rice and coconuts for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of rice and coconuts to sell

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.es:
Candelaria, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, es casada, administra una venta D. ropa, este negocio surgió por su propia iniciativa y con la ayuda D. su esposo, no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes.
Ella, está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. pantalones, camisas, ropa para niños y más mercadería para su negocio, esta compra la ayudara para ampliar el negocio y tener más mercadería para ofrecer a sus clientes.
Su mayor sueño es mejorar su vivienda, además que la experiencia con el negocio le ayuD. para continuar en el comercio.
texts.en:
Candelaria lives with her husband and two children. She is married and manages a clothing sales business. She got into the business by her own initiative and with the help of her husband. She has no fixed schedule for tending to her customers. 

She is seeking a loan to purchase pants, shirts, children's clothing and other merchandise for her business. This purchase will help her expand her business and have more merchandise to offer her customers. 

Her greatest dream is to make improvements to her living quarters, and that her experience with the enterprise would help her so she may continue on in the business.

loans.use: to purchase pants, shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fresh fish to smoke to supply her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy about 2 bags of corn to make dough to sell

loans.name: Tiessiri I Group

texts.fr:
Les dix femmes qui composent le groupe TIESSIRI I sont toutes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 39 ans et en moyenne 4 enfants. Elles vivent dans des familles polygames à Banco ville, chef lieu de commune rurale, préfecture de Dioïla, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du Mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont entre autres le riz et l’arachide. Elles sont à leur première collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce prêt, OUMOU, la deuxième personne debout à gauche , compte acheter les intrants, les petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir environs 0,25 hectare de riz.
Les productions sont vendues au niveau du marché de Baou, de Koula, de Banco et de N’Golobougou, après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elles comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 25 000F CFA environs par campagne.
texts.en:
The ten women who make up the Tiessiri I group are all married and average 39 years of age with an average of four children each. They live in polygamous families in Banco town, the administrative centre of the rural community in the prefecture of Dioïla, which lies in Koulikoro, which is the second administrative region of Mali.

They collaborate with the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, with the aim of organising their activities more effectively at the beginning of the rainy season. They grow, among other things, rice and groundnut. They are on their first loan from the institution.

With this loan, Oumou, who is standing second from the left, is planning to buy agricultural inputs and small farming equipment, as well to pay for labor costs to maintain around 0.25 hectars of rice.

Once harvested, the produce is sold at the markets in Baou, Koula, Banco and N'Golobougou, to a customer base made up of men and women.

The women are expecting to make an average profit of 25,000FCFA per season.

loans.use: to pay for labor, seeds, fertilizer, weedkiller and small farming equipment

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more iron to make more knives, doors and other metallic products to resell

loans.name: Jose Concepcion

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, es casado, vendedor rutero, dicho negocio comenzó como ayudante ahora tiene su propio negocio, trabaja de lunes a domingo y no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes.
El, está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de sodas, jugos, dulces, galletas y más mercadería para ofrecer a sus clientes, dicha compra le ayudara incrementar la mercadería y mejorar sus ventas.
Su mayor sueño es mantener siempre su negocio, mejorarlo para tener una mejor vida y ofrecérsela a su familia.
texts.en:
José is married, and he lives with his wife and two children.  He is a salesman with an established route.  He started as a helper, but he now has his own business.  He works Monday to Sunday.  He does not have a fixed schedule to attend to his customers.

He is requesting a loan to buy sodas, juices, sweets, cookies, and more merchandise to offer his customers.  This purchase will help him increase his merchandise and improve his sales.

His biggest dream is to always keep his business and to improve it in order to have a better life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy sodas, juices, sweets, and cookies for his business.

loans.name: Tiessiri Ii Group

texts.fr:
Les dix  membres du groupe TIESSIRI II sont de femmes mariées qui ont en moyenne 36 ans, ont en moyenne 4 enfants et qui vivent dans des familles polygames à Banco ville, un chef lieu de commune rurale dans la préfecture de Dioïla, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont entre autres le riz et l’arachide. Elles sont à leur première collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce premier prêt, SALI, la première debout à droite, compte acheter les intrants, les petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de main d’œuvre pour entretenir environs 0,5 hectare d’arachide.
Les productions sont vendues au niveau du marché de Baou, de Koula, de Banco et de N’Golobougou, après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elles comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 25 000F CFA environs par campagne.
texts.en:
The ten members of the TIESSIRI II solidarity group are married women who average 36 years of age and four children each. They live in polygamous families in Banco, country seat of a rural town in the prefecture of Dioïla, in the Koulikoro region (second administrative region of Mali).

They have partnered with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution to better organize their activities at the beginning of the rainy season. Their crops include rice and groundnuts. This is their first time collaborating with the MFI.

With this first loan, SALI, standing first from the right, plans to purchase inputs and small farming equipment, and pay for the labor needed to maintain approximately 0.50 hectare of groundnuts.

After the harvest, the crops are sold at the markets of Baou, Koula, Banco and N'Golobougou to a clientele composed of both men and women. The group members intend to earn an average profit of about 25,000 FCFA per season.

loans.use: to buy inputs and small farming equipment, and pay for labor

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase shirts, pants, skirts and more merchandise for the business.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a married woman with two children who are still too young for school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past one year, she has operated a food stall business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. She dreams of establishing a restaurant business in the future.

With the 10,000 KES, she wants to purchase bags of beans for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to businesses.

loans.use: to purchase bags of beans for resale

loans.name: Tiessiri Iii Group

texts.fr:
Les sept membres du groupe TIESSIRI III sont des femmes mariées  qui ont une moyenne d’âge de 31 ans et ont en moyenne 3 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles polygames à Banco ville, chef lieu d’une commune rurale relevant de la préfecture de Dioïla, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du Mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont entre autres le riz et l’arachide. Elles sont à leur première collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce premier prêt, GNINE, la première assise à gauche, compte acheter les intrants, les petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour et de sarclage pour entretenir environs 0,5 hectare de riz.
Les productions sont vendues au niveau du marché de Baou, de Koula, de Banco et de N’Golobougou, après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elles comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 20 000F CFA environs par campagne.
texts.en:
The seven members of the group TIESSIRI III are married women who average 31 years of age and three children each. The women live for the most part in polygamous families in Banco City, the seat of a rural commune belonging to the prefecture of Dioïla, region of Koulikoro (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The group members are collaborating with the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso with the goal of better organizing their work at the start of the off-season. The crops grown include rice and peanuts. They are now on their first collaboration with the institution. 

With this initial loan, GNINE, who is the first one seated from the left in the photo, intends to buy inputs and assorted farm equipment and supplies and to pay the cost of plowing and weeding to maintain about 0.5 hectare of rice. After the harvest, the produce is sold at the markets of Baou, Koula, Banco, and N’Golobougou. The customer base is composed of women and men. The group members plan on making an average profit of 20,000 francs CFA per planting.

loans.use: To pay for plowing, seeds, manure, herbicide, weeding, and assorted farm equipment and supplies

loans.name: Adina Esperanza

texts.es:
Adina, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, es casada, administra una tienda donD. ofrece artículos D. toda necesidad, este negocio se dio gracias a su propia iniciativa, lo instalo en su vivienda y lo atienD. personalmente a tiempo completo.
Ella, está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. artículos D. primera necesidad como queso, crema, cuajada y más mercadería, esta compra le permite ampliar el negocio y ofrecer más mercadería a sus clientes. 
Su mayor sueño es ampliar su negocio para recibir mayores ingresos, además ganar experiencia con el comercio para mejorar su negocio cada vez más.
texts.en:
Adina lives with her husband and two children. She is married and  manages a shop where she sells all kinds of basic items. This business came about thanks to her own initiative. She installed it in her own living quarters and provides full-time customer service, herself. 

She is seeking a loan to purchase basic staples such as cheese, cream, curdled milk cheese and other merchandise. This purchase will allow her to expand the business and offer more merchandise to her customers. 

Her greatest dream is to expand the business in order to obtain more income, as well as to gain more experience in the enterprise so she may improve her business more and more.

loans.use: to purchase cheese, cream, curdled milk cheese, beans and rice for the business.

loans.name: Darwin Javier

texts.es:
Darwin es un hombre de 27 años, vive con su esposa María Fernanda también de 27 años con quien tiene un bebe recién nacido hace un mes. Viven en Santo Domingo, en la parroquia de "Río Verde" de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas", una provincia que se encuentra al sur del Ecuador densamente poblada, su clima es cálido por lo que la producción frutal es una de las principales actividades económicas.

Hace 6 años atrás Darwin inició su negocio propio de venta de vidrio cortado a la medida para ventanas tras trabajar para una empresa privada de donde aprendió este oficio. Hoy da trabajo a dos personas, de lo cual se siente muy orgulloso. El necesita comprar materia prima de oportunidad por lo cual necesita un crédito. Fundación Alternativa en cumplimiento de su misión ha ayudado a este microempresario a lograr su objetivo para que, de esta manera pueda incrementar su ganancia y por ende sus ingresos.

Él sueña con tener una gran empresa que se dedique a esta misma actividad.
texts.en:
Darwin is a 27-year-old man. He lives with his wife María Fernanda who is also 27, with whom he has a newborn baby of one month. They live in Santo Domingo in the Río Verde parish of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, a densely-populated province located the southern part of Ecuador. Its climate is hot and so fruit orchards are one of the primary economic activities. 

Six years ago Darwin began his business selling custom-cut glass for windows, after working for a private company where he learned this line of work. Today he provides work for two persons, of which he is very proud. He needs to buy some raw materials, taking advantage of a special opportunity, and so he needs a loan. 

Fulfilling its mission Fundación Alternativa has helped this micro-business owner to achieve his objective and so, in this way, to increase his earnings and thus his income. 

He dreams of having a large enterprise in this same line of business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials, glass and metal.

loans.name: Jose Balmore

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y dos hijos,administra una panadería la cual surgió por iniciativa de él y su esposa, quien lo apoyo para llevar a cabo la instalación de dicho negocio, no tiene un horario fijo para atender a los clientes.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de 6 quintales de harina y otros  ingredientes, esta compra le permitirá producir más ventas y ampliar su negocio para tener más variedad de pan para sus clientes. 
Su mayor sueño es tener los suficientes ingresos de su negocio para poder darles a sus hijos la educación que ellos se merecen.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and two children.  He runs a bakery which arose out of his initiative and that of his wife, who supported him in undertaking the creation of this business.  He has no fixed schedule for serving his customers.

He is requesting a loan to buy 6 sacks of flour and other ingredients.  This purchase will allow him to generate more sales and expand his business to offer a greater variety of breads for his customers.

His biggest dream is to earn sufficient income from his business to give his children the education they deserve.

loans.use: to buy 6 sacks of flour, for his bakery.

loans.name: David

texts.es: El señor David  nació en la comunidad de el Torno es soltero, el se dedica a la agricultura tiene su terreno en los Limos a  10 km de Santa Rita el siembra arroz, yuca, y un poco de verduras para el consumo familiar. Pero todo lo que el siembra saca a vender mercado de la localidad,  es primera ves que saca crédito de Emprender el vive de la agricultura, a través de la siembra de sus productos el logro conseguir su parcela desde hace 3 años y desde entonces se  que se dedican a la agricultura, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en lo que implica el preparado d ela tierra y la compra de semillas para la siembra de arroz y yuca,  el Sr. David es una persona muy trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mr. David was born in the community of El Torno. He is single and devotes himself to farming. He has his land in Los Limos, ten kilometers from Santa Rita. He grows rice, yucca, and a few vegetables for family consumption. But everything he grows he takes to sell at the area market. This is his first time taking out a loan with Emprender and he earns a living by farming. 

By growing his products he was able to obtain his own plot of land three years ago, and since then has devoted himself to farming. He will use the money from the loan for preparing the land and purchasing seeds for planting rice and yucca. Mr. David is a very hardworking person, and appreciates the institution for the support it provides.

loans.use: for planting rice and yucca.

loans.name: Flor Carolina

texts.es:
Flor, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, es casada, administra una venta de ropa y cosméticos, este negocio surgió por iniciativa de su madre, quien se lo heredo, su horario es de 6:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m. todos los días.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de camisas, pantalones, faldas, vestidos  y más mercadería que es demandada por sus clientes, esta compra le permitirá ampliar su negocio y tener más mercadería para ofrecer a sus clientes.
Su mayor sueño es seguir trabajando fuerte para sacar adelante a su familia y con el apoyo financiero seguir creciendo en su microempresa.
texts.en:
Flor lives with her husband and three children,  She is married, and runs a clothing and cosmetics sales business.  This business was started on the initiative of her mother, from whom she inherited it.  Her hours are from 6:00 a.m. to 4:00 pm every day.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of shirts, pants, skirts, dresses and more merchandise that is in demand by her customers.  This purchase will allow her to expand her business and have more merchandise to offer her customers.

Her biggest dream is to continue working hard to move her family ahead in life, and with financial support, to continue to grow her micro-enterprise.

loans.use: to invest in shirts, pants, skirts, and dresses for her business.

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.es:
Cirilo, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, es casado, administra una tienda donde ofrece artículos de primera necesidad, este negocio surgió por iniciativa de él, no tiene horario fijo atiende el negocio de tiempo completo.
El está solicitando un préstamo el cual le ayudara en la compra de granos básicos, arroz, frijoles, sal, azucar, jabón, refrescos y más mercadería que es demandada por sus clientes, esta compra le permitirá ampliar su negocio y tener más mercadería para ofrecer a sus clientes.
Su mayor sueño es que sus hijos se casen y ampliar su negocio, para mejorar las ganancias.
texts.en:
Cirilo lives with his wife and two children.  He is married, and runs a shop  that provides every day items.  This business came about on his initiative.  He has no fixed schedule, and serves in the business full time.

He is requesting a loan which will help in the purchase of basic grains, rice, beans, salt, sugar, soap, soft drinks and other merchandise that is in demand by his customers. This acquisition will allow him to expand his business and have more merchandise to offer his customers.

His biggest dream is that his children marry, and that he expands his business to improve his earnings.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, salt, sugar, soap for his business.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El sr. Mario es esposo de una clienta antigua la Sra. María, ellos tienen dos hijas que ya se independizaron, una de ellas se casó y la otra trabaja y estudia, la Sra. María se dedica a la venta de leche, ella cría vacas, el esposo el sr.  Mario se dedica a la venta de arena y piedras, que saca del rio irpavi, anteriormente se dedicaba al manejo de transporte, el que lo vendió para adquirir un terreno, el sr. Mario solicita precisamente este crédito para tramites y regularización de ese bien, es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Señor Mario is married to a former client of his, Señora María.  They have two daughters who are financially independent; one is married and the other works and is a student.  María works selling milk; she raises cows.  Her husband, Señor Mario, works selling of sand and stones, which he collects from the Irpavi river.  Previously, he worked managing transportation, which he sold in order to buy land.  

Señor Mario is specifically requesting this loan for paperwork and regulation for his property.  He is a very responsible and hardworking person, who is grateful to the institution for the support being offered.

loans.use: to pay for paperwork related to his house.

loans.name: Mwanalima

texts.en:
Mwanalima is a married woman with eight children, all of whom are adults. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past three years, she has operated a coconut selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of theft because of insecurity in her area of operation. She dreams of establishing a retail shop business in the future.

With the 10,000 KES, she wants to purchase sacks of coconuts for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of coconuts for resale

loans.name: Juana Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARIA ELENA MOYANO”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito D. Huanchac en la Provincia D. Cusco y Departamento D. Cusco.

La socia Juana; La socia tiene 55 años D. edad, la socia es casada y  tiene 5 hijos D. 34, 30, 28, 25, 15 años D. edad; la socia es cosmetóloga D. profesión, la socia tiene su salón D. belleza en casa desD. hace 20 años,  la socia requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales D. trabajo; la socia comprara mas peines D. todo grosor, secadoras D. cabello, bigudíes, entre otros materiales para implementar su negocio y para el pago D. los estudios D. sus hijos con la otra parte. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. materiales para implementar su salón D. belleza como bigudíes, peines, secadoras D. cabello y con la otra parte el pago D. los estudios D. sus hijos.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir D. manera disciplinada con los pagos D. las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank "Maria Elena Moyano".  The bank is located in the District of Huanchac in the Province of Cusco and Department of Cusco.

The member is Juana.  The member is 55 years old, and the member is married with 5 children aged 34, 30, 28, 25, and 15 years old.  The member is a cosmetologist by profession, and the member has had a beauty salon in her home for the last 20 years.

The member is requesting the loan to purchase items for her work.  The member will buy more combs of all thicknesses, hair dryers, curlers, and other items to support her business, and will pay for the education of their children with the other part.   The member is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of  items to support her beauty salon, such as curlers, combs, hair dryers, and with the other part, she will pay for the education of her children.

The member appreciates the support being given to her, and likewise agrees to comply in a disciplined manner with the repayments of the loan.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of items for supporting her beauty salon, such as curlers, combs, hair dryers, and with the other part, she will pay for the education of her children.

loans.name: Jose Moises

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y un hijo, es casado, administra una granja para pollos de engorde, dicho negocio fue creado por iniciativa de él y su esposa, no cuenta con horario fijo para atender a sus clientes. 
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de pollitos de un día de nacidos, el concentrado para la alimentación y las vacunas necesarias para su crecimiento, esto le permitirá ampliar su negocio.
Su más anhelado sueño es mejorar su vivienda y tener otro negocio para su esposa, además en un futuro tener un negocio turístico.
texts.en:
José, lives with his wife and son.  He’s married.  He runs a chicken farm.  He and his wife started the business on their own initiative.  He does not have a fixed schedule to take care of customers.

He is asking for a loan to buy one-day-old chicks, the feed concentrate for them and the necessary vaccines for their growth; this will make it possible for him to expand his business.

His greatest wish is to do some home improvements and to have an additional business for his wife as well as to have a tourism-related business in the future.

loans.use: to buy chicks and feed concentrate for them.

loans.name: Jose Concepcion

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, es casado, administra una venta de ropa y artículos plásticos,  este negocio surgió por iniciativa propia, es una venta ambulante por ello no tiene un horario fijo para atender a sus clientes.
El, solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería como ropa, cosméticos y más mercadería que es demandada por sus clientes, esta compra le permitirá ampliar su negocio.
Su mayor sueño es mejorar su vivienda y darles a sus hijos la educación adecuada.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and two children.  He’s married.  He runs a clothing and plastics sales business.  This business arose through his own initiative.  It’s a street vending operation so he does not have a fixed work schedule to take care of customers.

He is asking for a loan to buy merchandise like clothes, cosmetics and other merchandise requested by his customers.  This purchase will allow him to expand his business.  His greatest dream is to improve his house and provide his children with an adequate education.

loans.use: to buy clothes and cosmetics for the business.

loans.name: Djekafo Iv Group

texts.fr:
Les dix membres du groupe DJEKAFO IV sont des femmes mariées. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 42 ans et ont en moyenne 6 enfants. Elles vivent majoritairement dans des familles polygames à Konfon, l’un des villages de la commune rurale de Banco, préfecture de Dioïla, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du Mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont entre autres le riz et l’arachide. Elles sont à leur première collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce premier prêt, AWA TAHIROU, qui est debout au milieu, compte acheter les intrants, les petits équipements et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir environs 0,25 hectare d’arachide.
Les productions sont vendues au niveau du marché de Klè, de Banco et de N’Golobougou, après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elles comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  15 000F CFA environs par campagne.
texts.en:
The ten members of DJEKAFO IV are married women. They are on average 42 years old and have an average of 6 children each. For the most part they live in polygamous families in Konfon, one of the villages in the rural commune of Banco, Dioïla prefecture, Koulikoro region, 2nd administrative district of Mali. 

They are working with micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to better organize their activities at the beginning of the rainy season. The crops they grow are, among others, rice and groundnuts. This is their first loan with Soro Yiriwaso. With the loan, Awa Tahirou, standing in the middle, plans to buy inputs, small equipment and to pay for plowing costs in order to maintain about 0.25 hectare of groundnuts. After the harvest, the crops are sold at the Klè, Banco and N'Golobougou markets to customers who are both men and women. 

The group members expect  to make an average profit of 15,000 CFA francs per season.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, seeds, fertilizer, weedkiller, hoeing an small equipment.

loans.name: Pamela Nidia

texts.es: La señorita Pamela es una cliente nueva quien llegó a nuestra institución por recomendación de una antigua cliente quien ya no trabaja con nosotros, ella vive con sus padres  y sus hermano, vende electrodomésticos a facilidad de pago en dos a tres pagos, también por otro lado vende ropa juvenil o lo que el cliente le haga pedido como ser zapatos, pantalones, carteras, etc. Ya viene trabajando desde hace tiempo le fue bien así que continua con el negocio y actualmente solicita para comprar un electrodomésticos y otros pedidos que le hicieron de ropa,  también estudia por las mañanas lo cual nos indica que es una joven responsable quien ayuda  a su familia con los ingresos y se encuentra agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Pamela is a new client who came to our institution recommended by a former client who no longer collaborates with us.  She lives with her parents and her brother.  

She sells home appliances on easy two or three payments.  She also sells clothes for young adults or whatever her customers order from her like shoes, pants, purses, etc.  She’s been working for some time now and has done well so continues with the business.  

She is asking for a loan presently to buy home appliances and some pending clothing orders.  She also is taking classes in the morning which indicates that she’s a responsibly young woman who helps her family with income and who is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy home appliances and assorted clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy crop fertilizer and to buy fruit such as apples, oranges, and plantains for her business.

loans.name: Zonia Aida

texts.es:
Zonia, vive con un nieto, es casada, administra un negocio de venta de tortillas y antojitos, dicho negocio surgió por su iniciativa, lo atiende de 8:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m. todos los días.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz, aceite, condimentos y materia prima para la elaboración de diferentes antojitos y platillos para su negocio, esta compra le ayudara a vender más y recibir más ingresos para pagar la deuda.
Su mayor deseo es mejorar su negocio para recibir más ingresos para tener su propia casa y trabajar con su propio dinero.
texts.en:
Zonia, lives with a grandson, is married, and runs a business selling tortillas and snacks.  This business came about by her own initiative.  She serves customers from 8:00 am to 4:00 pm every day.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of corn, oil, spices and raw materials to prepare various snacks and dishes for her business.  This acquisition will help her sell more and receive more income to pay back the debt.

Her greatest desire is to improve her business for more income to own your own home and work with her own money.

loans.use: to buy corn, oil, condiments and snacks to prepare tortillas.

loans.name: Djekafo V Group

texts.fr:
Les dix  membres du groupe DJEKAFO V sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans et ont en moyenne 6 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles polygames à Konfon, l’un des villages de la commune rurale de Banco, préfecture de Dioïla, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du Mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont entre autres le riz et l’arachide. Elles sont à leur première collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce prêt, OUMOU la deuxième assises à gauche, compte acheter les intrants, les petits équipements et payer les frais de labour et de sarclage pour entretenir environs 0,5 hectare de riz et d’arachide.
Les productions sont vendues au niveau du marché de Klè, de Banco et de N’Golobougou, après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elles comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 20 000F CFA environs par campagne.
texts.en:
The ten members of DJEKAFO V are married women. They are on a average 43 years old and have an average of 6 children each. For the most part they live in polygamous families in Konfon, one of the villages in the rural commune of Banco, Dioïla prefecture, Koulikoro region, 2nd administrative district of Mali.

They are working with micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to better organize their activities at the beginning of the rainy season. The crops they grow are, among others, rice and groundnuts. This is their first loan with Soro Yiriwaso. With the loan, Oumou, seated, 2nd from the left, plans to buy inputs, small equipment and to pay for plowing and hoeing costs in order to maintain about 0.5 hectare of rice and groundnuts. After the harvest, the crops are sold at the Klè, Banco and N'Golobougou markets to customers who are both men and women.

The group members expect to make an average profit of 20,000 CFA francs per season.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, seeds, fertilizer, weedkiller, hoeing and small equipment.

loans.name: Damaris Del Rosario

texts.es:
Damaris del Rosario tiene 23 años de edad, es soltera, vive con sus padres e hija de 7 años en el Cantón Chillanes, Provincia de Bolívar. 

La V.R.C NUEVE DE ABRIL, se encuentra ubicada en la parroquia  San José del Tambo, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de maíz y cacao.

Damaris se dedica a la agricultura y al comercio de prendas de vestir. Compra y vende sus productos en el mercado de San José del Tambo.

Solicita el crédito para comprar mercadería. El crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar su actividad comercial. Enfrenta desafíos como la caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los intermediarios. Su sueño es tener una casa propia.

Le gusta jugar escuchar música y realizar labores domésticas.
texts.en:
Damaris del Rosario, 23, is single and lives with her parents and 7-year old daughter in the Chillanes canton, Bolivar province.

The Nueve de Abril V.R.C. (communal bank) is located in the  San José del Tambo parrish, in Chillanes canton where the members of this chapter work in agriculture, principally growing corn and cacao.

Damaris farms and also sells clothing.  She buys and sells her products in the San José del Tambo market.

She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise.  It will help her cover her expenses and improve her business.  She, as do the middlemen, faces challenges such as the drop in prices of the products that she sells.  Her dream is to have her own house.

She likes to listen to music and work in her home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Mireya

texts.es: La señora Mireya oriunda del Jorochito de santa cruz, vive con el sr. Santiago tienen dos hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, viven en su propio domicilio que se encuentra ubicado en zona el torno, su actividad económica es venta de comidas en su propio domicilio hace un año, el destino del crédito es para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus platillos,  es una persona muy trabajadora y se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo que se le ha brindado.
texts.en: Ms. Mireya, native of Jorochito de Santa Cruz, lives with Mr. Santiago. They have two school aged children. The live in their own home located in "el torno" area. Her business has been selling food in her home for a year. Her loan will be used  to purchase consumables to make her dishes. She is a very hardworking person and she is grateful to the institution for the support offered to her.

loans.use: purchase consumables for the preparation of food.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis Alberto tiene 63 años, su actividad es la venta y elaboración de pirotecnia. Hace más de 25 años que tiene este negocio, el esfuerzo y dedicación que le brinda a este medio de vida ha hecho lo necesario para mantener a su familia. El financiamiento que actualmente solicita es para la compra de pólvora, madera, carbón, acido sulfúrico, nitro, azufre y otros elementos químicos que son necesarios para la elaboración de sus productos. Luis es una persona muy emprendedora y disfruta de realizar su actividad todos los días.
texts.en: Luis Alberto is 63 years old. His activity is making and selling fireworks. He has had this business for more than 25 years. The hard work and dedication  he brings to this lifestyle has achieved everything necessary to support his family. The loan he is asking for now is to buy gun powder, wood, coal, sulphuric acid, nitrate, sulphur and more chemical elements necessary for making his products. Luis is a very enterprising person and he enjoys doing his activity every day.

loans.use: to buy gun powder, wood, coal, sulphuric acid, nitrate and sulphur.

loans.name: Homer Edgardo

texts.es:
Homer, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, es casado, es agricultor y vendedor de semilla de marañón, dicho negocio surgió por su propia iniciativa y con la ayuda de su esposa, no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas (abono), esta compra le ayudara a tener todos los insumos necesarios para la siembra y sacar una mejor cosecha para ofrecer a sus clientes.
Su más grande sueño es mejorar su negocio, aumentar la compra de semilla y ser un buen cliente con buena moral de pago y un espíritu emprendedor.
texts.en:
Homer lives with his wife and two children. He is a farmer and sells cashew apple seeds. He started this business on his own with his wife's help. He has no set schedule to serve his customers.

He is asking for a loan to buy agricultural materials (fertilizer). This purchase will help him have all the materials he needs to plant and have a better harvest to offer his customers.

His biggest dream is to improve his business, increase his seed purchases and to be a good client with a good payment history and an enterprising spirit.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for planting corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase sweets, soft drinks, chips, cookies for her business.

loans.name: Djekafo Vi Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe DJEKAFO VI est constitué de dix femmes mariées qui ont une moyenne d’âge de 44 ans et ont en moyenne 6 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles polygames à Konfon, l’un des villages de la commune rurale de Banco, préfecture de Dioïla, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du Mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont entre autres le riz et l’arachide. Elles sont à leur première collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce premier prêt, MINATA  deuxième personne à partir de la droite dans le rang des debout, compte acheter les intrants, les petits équipements et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir environs 0,5 hectare de riz et d’arachide.
Les productions sont vendues au niveau du marché de Klè, de Banco et de N’Golobougou, après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elles comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 15 000F CFA environs par campagne.
texts.en:
The DJEKAFO VI group is made up of married women. They are on a average 44 years old and have an average of 6 children each. For the most part they live in polygamous families in Konfon, one of the villages in the rural commune of Banco, Dioïla prefecture, Koulikoro region, 2nd administrative district of Mali.

They are working with micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to better organize their activities at the beginning of the rainy season. The crops they grow are, among others, rice and groundnuts. This is their first loan with Soro Yiriwaso. With the loan, Minata, 2nd from the right, standing, plans to buy inputs, small equipment and to pay for plowing costs in order to maintain about 0.5 hectare of rice and groundnuts. After the harvest, the crops are sold at the Klè, Banco and N'Golobougou markets to customers who are both men and women.

The group members expect to make an average profit of 15,000 CFA francs each season.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, seeds, fertilizer, weedkiller, and small equipment

loans.name: Djekafo Vii Group

texts.fr:
Les six  membres du groupe DJEKAFO VII sont des femmes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 41 ans et  en moyenne 6 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles polygames à Konfon, l’un des villages de la commune rurale de Banco, préfecture de Dioïla, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du Mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont entre autres le riz et l’arachide. Elles sont à leur première collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce prêt, LALA SALIF, qui est assise au milieu, compte acheter les intrants, les petits équipements et payer les frais de labour et sarclage pour entretenir environs 0,5 hectare de riz et d’arachide.
Les productions sont vendues au niveau du marché de Klè, de Banco et de N’Golobougou, après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elles comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 20 000F CFA environs par campagne.
texts.en:
The six members of DJEKAFO VII are married women. They are on a average 41 years old and have an average of 6 children each. For the most part they live in polygamous families in Konfon, one of the villages in the rural commune of Banco, Dioïla prefecture, Koulikoro region, 2nd administrative district of Mali.

They are working with micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to better organize their activities at the beginning of the rainy season. The crops they grow are, among others, rice and groundnuts. This is their first loan with Soro Yiriwaso. With the loan, Lala Salif, seated, in the middle, plans to buy inputs, small equipment and to pay for plowing and hoeing costs in order to maintain about 0.5 hectare of rice and groundnuts. After the harvest, the crops are sold at the Klè, Banco and N'Golobougou markets to customers who are both men and women.

The group members expect to make an average profit of 20,000 CFA francs each season.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, seeds, fertilizer, weedkiller, hoeing and small equipment.

loans.name: Africana Group

texts.en:
Agnes is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Forty-nine-year-old Agnes is married to a professional worker and the couple has 10 children. Agnes sells locally manufactured soap called “Africa” and has been doing business for many years now. Agnes and members of her team have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of 600,000 SLL for each in order to develop their respective businesses. Agnes is going to use her share of the loan to buy soap making materials (oil, caustic soda, etc.) in order to produce a larger quantity of soap for sale. 

(Also included in the left of the photo is loan officer Edna B. Conteh, handing over the loan to the borrowers)

loans.use: to buy soap-making materials (oil, caustic soda, etc.) in order to produce a larger quantity of soap for sale

loans.name: Rosa Mirian

texts.es:
Rosa, vive con su mama y con una hija, administra un negocio el cual surgió por iniciativa propia y con la ayuda D. su madre lo a podido sacar adelante, trabaja todos los días D. 7:30 a.m. a 5:00 p.m.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. diferentes artículos para su negocio como lo es ropa (blusas, faldas, short para niños y camisas D. niños talbien bolsones, esta compra le ayudara a tener en mejores condiciones su negocio y así ofrecerles más producto a sus clientes.
Su sueño más granD. es continuar trabajando para recibir más ganancias y sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa lives with her mother and her daughter. She manages a business and acted on her own initiative. Also, with the help of her mother, she has been able to make progress. She works every day from 7:30 a.m. a 5:00 p.m.
She is requesting a loan for the purchase of different items for her business like clothing (shirts, skirts, shorts and shirts for children as well as bags). This purchase will help her to have better conditions for her business and offer more products to her customers.
Her biggest dream is to continue working in order to earn more income and keep her family moving forward.

loans.use: purchase shirts, skirts and shorts for adults and children.

loans.name: Yacquelyn Esmeralda

texts.es:
Yacquelyn, vive con su esposo y un hijo, administra un negocio de mariscos, pupusas y comida, este negocio surgió por su propia iniciativa y con la ayuda de su esposo, trabaja a tiempo completo no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mariscos, materia prima para las pupusas y la venta de cenas, los produstos son aceite, chicharron, pollo, condimentos, maiz;  esta compra le permitirá ampliar su menú para darle mejor atención a sus clientes.
Su mayor sueño es mejorar su negocio y sus ingresos para el bienestar de su familia y ser una buena clienta con pagos puntuales.
texts.en:
Yacquelyn lives with her husband and one son. She runs a business selling seafood, pupusas [filled tortillas] and main dishes. This business arose from her own initiative and with the help of her husband. She works full-time and does not have a fixed schedule for serving her customers. 

She is requesting a loan to buy seafood as well as ingredients for the pupusas and the dinners. The products she will buy are oil, ground pork, chicken, condiments, and corn. This purchase will allow her to expand her menu and provide better service to her customers. 

Her greatest dream is to improve her business and raise her income for the well-being of her family, and to be a good client who is punctual with her payments.

loans.use: to buy seafood, oil, pork rinds, chicken, condiments and corn to prepare the food she sells.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients for making pupusas: pork, cheese, corn, oil and condiments

loans.name: Lucinda Maribel

texts.es:
Lucinda tiene 32 años vive en Machachi cerca de Latacunga con su esposo y un hijo que tiene 7 años, se desribe como una persona pacífica que si se le presentan problemas los trata de resolver y le gusta trabajar con sus vacas.

Trabaja en la crianza de ganado para la producción de leche,si ha trabajado con FODEMI, el crédito que solicita es para comprar un ternero que en un futuro aumentará sus ingresos y mejorará su calidad de vida; su sueño es tener un ordeño metálico (máquina para ordeñar vacas) para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lucinda is 32 years old and lives in Machachi, near Latacunga, with her husband and their 7 year-old son. She describes herself as a peaceful person who, when faced with problems, tries to resolve them. She enjoys working with her cows.

She works raising cows for milk production. She has worked with FODEMI before. She is requesting this loan to buy a calf that will increase her future earnings and improve her quality of life. Her dream is to have a machine that milks cows, as this would improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a calf

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, brick and stone to make home improvements

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: La Sra. Beatriz nació en santa cruz de la sierra - tiene una  hija ella es separada hace varios años. La señora se encuentra muy contenta ya que su hija la hará abuela se dedica a la venta de carne hace 25 años en el mercadito de  la zona, también en tiempos atrás ella trabajaba en banco perteneciente a la misma institución pero como todo llego a su final entonces decidieron sacar credito individual,  hace 49 años que  esta viviendo en la localidad de la guardia  hace 5 años que se fue a vivir en la casa de su amiga ella se encuentra muy agradecida con la institución porque gracias a ella lograra comprar otro Frizzer mas grande para almacenar sus productos ya que sera su herramienta de trabajo ya que lo encontró de ocasión, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institucion por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Ms. Beatriz was born in Santa Cruz de la Sierra. She has one daughter and has been separated for many years. Beatriz is very happy because her daughter is about to make her a grandmother.

Beatriz has been selling meat in the local market for 25 years. In the past, she participated in a communal bank with Emprender, but like everything, that came to an end. Then she decided to take out an individual loan.

She has been living in the locality of La Guardia since she went to live at her friend's house five years ago. She is very grateful to the organization because thanks to this loan, she will be able to buy another, bigger freezer for storing her products. This will be very useful in her work and she found it at a bargain price. She is a very hard-working person and is grateful for the support being offered to her.

loans.use: to buy another freezer

loans.name: Javier Abdul

texts.es:
Javier, vive con su esposa y un hijo,  agricultor y carnicero, este negocio surgió por iniciativa de su padre quien le enseño el oficio, trabaja todos los días y no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de producto necesario para la preparación del terreno como lo es el abono, esta compra le permitirá tener una mejor siembra de maíz para ofrecérsela a sus clientes.
Su objetivo es seguir trabajando en la agricultura y poder tener una estabilidad mas placentera junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Javier lives with his wife and their son. He is a farmer and butcher. He started his business on his own initiative, and it was his father who taught him this type of work. He works every day but does not have a fixed schedule for tending to his customers.

He is requesting a loan to buy necessary supplies for preparing his land, such as fertilizer. This purchase will allow him to have a better corn crop to offer his customers.

Javier's goal is to continue working in agriculture and to be able to enjoy a more pleasant stability together with his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for planting corn

loans.name: Four Mile Traders Group

texts.en:
Meet with members of the “Four Mile Traders” group from the small town of Waterloo, near Sierra Leone’s capital city Freetown. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, for a loan of SLL 600,000 each. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions.

Iye is the leader of this group. A 34-year-old married mother of three children, Iye has been a businesswoman for 10 years now, selling dishes, plastic bowls, spoons, etc. With her share of this loan, she will buy the above-mentioned items wholesale to add to her current stock.

(Also included on the left in the photo is loan officer Edna B. Conteh, handing over the loan to the borrowers.)

loans.use: to buy dishes, plastic bowls, spoons, etc. wholesale to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Jeannette De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Jeannette, vive con su papá, mamá y un hermano, es soltera, sastra, dicho negocio surgió por iniciativa propia y la ayuda de sus padres, quienes la apoyaron para que lo instalara en la vivienda, no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes.
Ella esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de una máquina de coser para aumentar la producción, esta compra le ayudara a mejorar su negocio y sus ganancias.
El sueño de ella es que su negocio crezca con clientes para producir más y para mejorar su calidad de vida y el de su familia.
texts.en:
Jeannette lives with her father, mother and a brother. She is single and works as a seamstress. She started this business on her own initiative, with help from her parents. They supported her so that she could set up her business in their house. She does not have a fixed schedule for tending to her customers.

She is requesting a loan to buy a sewing machine in order to increase her productivity. This purchase will help her to improve her business and increase her profits.

Jeannette's dream is for her business to gain customers so that she can produce more and improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Lucinda Maribel

texts.es:
Lucinda, vive con su esposo y su hijo, es casada, administra una venta de ropa y una sastrería, negocios que fundo por iniciativa propia y con la ayuda de su esposo, trabaja todos los días de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m. 
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de vestidos, camisas, pantalones, tela y más mercadería para sus negocios, esta compra le ayudara a ampliar su negocio y a mejorar los ingresos.
El sueño de Lucinda es mejorar sus ganancias para ayudar a su hijo en sus estudios hasta terminar su carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Lucinda is married and lives with her husband and son.  She is a seamstress and sells clothing, working everyday from 7:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.  She started her business with the help of her husband.

She is requesting a loan to buy dresses, shirts, trousers, fabric and other merchandise so she can grow her business and improve income.

Lucinda's goal is to make enough money to help her son get a university degree.

loans.use: To buy dresses, shirts, trousers and fabric.

loans.name: Laura's Group

texts.es:
Laura tiene 36 años vive en Ibarra con su esposo y 5 hijos los cuales tienen 20, 15, 13, 10 y 2 años se describe como una persona tranquila y trabajadora.

Trabaja en la confección de bordados a mano sola, sus padres la enseñaron a bordar, trabaja con FODEMI casi ya 4 años, el crédito que ha solicitado es para la compra de materia prima (tela) para la confección de bordados; con este préstamo aumentaría su producción y mejoraría sus ingresos y a la vez su calidad de vida.

Sueña con construirse su propia casa, darles una buena educación a sus hijos y ponerse un pequeño local para su negocio.
texts.en:
Laura is 36 and lives in Ibarra with her husband and five children, ages 20, 15, 13, 10 and 2.  She describes herself as being calm and hard-working.

She does  which she learned from her parents.  For nearly four years she has been involved in FODEMI.  The loan she is requesting will be ued to buy raw material (fabric) for her embroidery.  With the loan she will increase production and improve her income as well as her quality of life.

Her dream is to build her own house and give her children a good education.  She would like to open a small shop for her business one day.

loans.use: To buy raw material.

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es: José su compañera de vida trabaja como domestica siendo un ingreso mas, sus planes es mejorar la infraestructura de la vivienda a futuro establecer un negocio. Trabaja para una empresa privada, se le ha presentando dificultades  para la construcción total por la afectación de la calle en tiempo de lluvia.  Con el préstamo comprar materiales de construcción como: cemento, hierro, arena, piedras cantera, estribu, bloques, tablón de madera para construir el muro de atrás de la propiedad. Obteniendo seguridad y protección para su familia.
texts.en: José lives with his partner who is a domestic employee and contributes to the family household.  His plans are to improve the infrastructure of his house so he can set up a business there in the future.  Currently he works for a private company.  He has been unable to finish the house because of the effects of the rainy season.  He plans to use the loan to buy construction materials such as cement, iron, sand, stone, supports, blocks and wood planks to build a wall behind his property.  This will give his family more security and protection.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Jose Rufino

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijas es casado, agrícola y ganadero, dicho negocio surgió gracias a sus padres quienes le enseñaron el oficio desde hace ya varios años, trabaja todos los días de 6:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m. 
El esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abono, veneno y otros fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y frijoles, esta compra le ayudara garantizar la siembra y ofrecerles mejores granos a sus clientes.
Su mayor sueño es apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios y cubrir sus gastos económicos cotidianos.
texts.en:
José is married and lives with his wife and two children.  He is a farmer who learned his trade from his parents several years ago.  He works every day from 6:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m.

He is requeting a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for his corn and bean crops.  The purchase will help guarantee a successful harvest and better quality produce for his customers.

His dream is to give his children an education and to take care of daily household expenses.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Okada Riders Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you members of the “Okada Riders” group. These are small scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders for a loan of SLL 1,000,000.00 each in order to invest in their business. 

Osman, the 25-year-old  leader of this team, is married and has one child. Osman and his teammates are all Okada (motor-bike taxi) drivers, he for the past three years. With the help of this loan, they will each buy a new motor-bike. 

(Also included on the left in the photo is loan officer Edna B. Conteh, shown handing over the loan to the Okada Riders)

loans.use: to buy a new motor-bike.

loans.name: Ana Lucia

texts.es:
Ana, vive con su esposo y una hija, es casada, administra una tienda donde ofrece artículos de primera necesidad, este negocio surgió por iniciativa propia, lo atiende d 6:00 a.m. a 7:00 p.m. de lunes a domingo.
Ella esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de aceite, pollo, galletas, refrescos, entre otros productos, esta compra le ayudara a fortalecer el negocio y a tener mayores ingresos.
Su mayor sueño es incrementar la clientela para mejorar los ingresos y ayudar a su familia en los gastos necesarios.
texts.en:
Ana is married and lives with her husband and daughter.  She has a store, which she began on her own initiative, and sells basic needs items.  Her working hours are 6:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m., Monday through Sunday.

She is requesting a loan to buy oil, chicken, cookies, and softdrinks, among other items.  This will help strengthen her business and increase income.

Her dream is to increase her customer base and improve income so she can help her family cover household expenses.

loans.use: To buy oil, chicken, cookies, softdrinks, and eggs for her business.

loans.name: Ana Cristina

texts.es:
ANA CRISTINA
quien es casada y tiene 3 niños en edad escolar, y  se dedica a la venta de ropa típica en la localidad de su cominudad de manera ambulante, como también apoya a su esposo en el cultivo de rosas. Es una mujer con deseos de superar  día tras día los obstáculos que la vida trae, ella quiere ver en un futuro a sus hijos  preparados  y graduados  a pesar  de la corta edad que tienen. Con el negocio que tiene ayuda a su esposo en el sustento de la familia, pero sobre todo quiere lograr tener un patrimonio poco a  poco a sus niños. Su mayor obstáculo es la inversión que se necesita en este negocio, por lo cual ella requiere de más capital  para seguir invirtiendo he innovando la necesidad de su clientela.esta solicitando este credito para la comra de ropa tipica. para la venta.
texts.en:
Ana Cristina is married and has three school age children. She sells traditional clothing as a street vendor from a location in her community. In addition, she helps her husband with cultivating roses. Ana Cristina is a woman who has the desire to overcome the obstacles that life presents day after day. In the future, she wants to see her children prepared and graduated from school even though they are still young. This business allows her to help her husband sustain their family, but all of her efforts are focused on gradually building an inheritance for her children.

Her greatest obstacle is the investment that she needs for this business. Ana Cristina needs more capital so that she can continue investing and innovating so as to meet the needs of her customers. She is requesting this loan to buy traditional clothing to sell.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing to sell.

loans.name: Jose Erasmo

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y tres hijos, es casado, se dedica al comercio de ganado desde hace diez años, este negocio surgió por su propia iniciativa, comercializa el ganado los días martes y sábado 7:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m. en el tiangue de la ciudad.
El esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de ganado para la venta, esta compra le ayudara a fortalecer el negocio y obtener mas ganancias.
Su mayor sueño es sacar adelante a su familia y darle la educación adecuada a sus hijos ofreciendoles un desarrollo economico para el futuro.
texts.en:
Jose lives with his wife and their three children. He is married and he has been involved in livestock farming for the past ten years. He started out this business under his own initiative. He sells his livestock on Tuesdays and Mondays from 7:00 am to 3:00 pm in the city's market.

He requests a loan to purchase livestock to resell. This purchase will help him strengthen his business and to obtain more earnings.

His greatest dream is to move forward with his family and to provide an adequate education to his children, to offer them a better financial future.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Paola Cecilia

texts.es:
Paola tiene 28 años vive con su esposo en Machachi cerca de Latacunga, no tienen hijos, se describe como una persona trabajadora, responsable, humilde que lucha ante las adversidades y cumple con sus objetivos.

Trabaja en corte y confección de calentadoes,pezcadores, etc; puso su taller hace tres años gracias a FODEMI, solicitó el crédito para la compra de materia prima (rollos de tela lycra) el cual le proporciona más mercadería y le generaría mas ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.

Su sueño es que su negocio crezca y poder crear fuentes de trabajo para mujeres necesitadas, también su anhelo es poder construir su propia casa y dejar de pagar arriendo.
texts.en:
Paola is 28 years old and she lives with her husband in Machachi, near Latacunga. They do not have children. She describes herself as a hardworking, responsible, and humble person who struggles in the face of adversities and who attains her objectives. 

She makes sweaters and jackets, etc. She set up her shop three years ago thanks to FODEMI (Kiva Field Partner). She requested a loan to purchase materials (rolls of Lycra brand fabric). This will allow her to make more products and it will generate for her more income to improve her quality of life. 

Her dream is to see her business grow and to be able to create jobs for women in need. Her goal is also to build a house of her own and to stop having to rent.

loans.use: to purchase rolls of Lycra brand fabric.

loans.name: Hector Eduardo

texts.es:
Héctor, vive con su esposa y tres hijos, empleado de una agencia de seguridad y ademas es agricultor, cultiva maíz y frijoles,  dicho negocio surgió por su propia iniciativa trabaja todos los días y no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes de agricultura.
El esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abono, pesticidas y otros fertilizantes para el cultivo, esta compra le permitirá garantizar la siembra y darles un mejor producto a sus clientes.
Su objetivo es mejorar los ingresos para apoyar a su familia con los gastos más necesarios.
texts.en:
Hector lives with his wife and their three children. He is employed by a security agency and he is also an agriculturist who cultivates corn and beans. He started out his business under his own initiative, working every day and not working under a fixed schedule in attending his agricultural customers.

The loan which he requests will be used to purchase fertilizers, pesticides, and other types of fertilizers for the cultivations. This purchase will help him guarantee the plantation and to provide his clients with a better products.

His objective is to improve his income in order to support his family with the most necessary expenses.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides for his cultivation.

loans.name: Amavi

texts.fr:
Amavi est une femme âgée de 40 ans. Elle est mariée å un chauffeur. Elle a 02 enfants. 
Amavi travaille comme revendeuse d’oranges depuis 2002. 
Amavi a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des oranges.
texts.en: Amavi is a forty year old mother of two children who is married to a chauffeur/driver and lives in Togo. She has been working in orange sales since 2002. She is asking for her first loan from WAGES in order to purchase more oranges from a wholesale distributor.

loans.use: Purchase oranges

loans.name: Seidy

texts.es: Seidy, tiene la edad 49 de  años, está casada y vive con su esposo hijos y un nieto. Ella pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de materiales para la construcción de un local para poner una costureria. Ella cuenta con maquinas de coser a su poder y lo que pretende es construir un local par tener donde colocar las maquinas para trabajar. Ella quiere tener un local para hacer sus costuras para su posterior venta en el mercado de la localidad o lugares aledaños. Ella quiere generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para su bienestar  y la de su familia y  crecer con le proyecto de costureria. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Seidy is 49 years old, married and she lives with her husband and children, and a grandson. She plans on purchasing construction materials with her loan to build a store space in which to set up a tailoring shop. She owns sewing machines and what she plans to do is to set up a space where she can place her machines to be able to work. She wants to have a store pace to craft her projects to later resell in the market in her locality and to other places. She wants to generate more income for the sake of her well-being and that of her family. She wants to make her tailoring business grow. It is the first loan which she receives from Fudecosur (Kiva Field Partner). She has not had previous loans with other state banks but Fudecosur has provided her with a loan, including greater benefits and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to build a store space in which to set up her tailoring shop.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Maiminatou

texts.fr:
Maiminatou Afi est une femme âgée de 33 ans. Elle est mariée et son conjoint est sérigraphe. Elle a 02 enfants. 
Maiminatou Afi travaille comme revendeuse de produits pharmaceutiques depuis 2001. Elle vend seule à tous ceux qui sont dans le besoin. 
Elle achète les produits à Lomé et à l’extérieur.
Maiminatou Afi a requis son second  cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des médicaments.
texts.en: Maiminatou Afi is a 33 year old woman and mother of two children living in Togo. Her husband works in the silkscreening industry. She has been selling pharmaceutical products since 2001, taking care only to sell to those with a real need for the medicine. She purchases her products in Lomé. She is asking for a secon loan from WAGES in order to purchase a greater stock of medicines.

loans.use: Purchase pharmaceutical products

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco, vive con su esposa,se dedica a las labores agrícola y ganaderas, este negocio surgió gracias al apoyo de sus padres quienes tienen experiencia en el negocio, no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de ganado y lo necesario para mantenerlo, esta compra le ayudara a ampliar su negocio, mejorar su clientela y sus ganancias.
El objetivo de Francisco es mejorar el negocio de ganado, mejorar sus ingresos y ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco lives with his wife and engages in farm work and raising livestock. His business has progressed thanks to the support from his parents, who have experience in this line of work. Francisco does not work on a fixed schedule when attending to his customers.

He is requesting a loan to buy livestock and what he needs to maintain them. This purchase will help to expand his business, improve his customer base, and generate more income. Francisco’s goals are to improve his livestock business, improve his earnings, and offer a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Miriam Leticia

texts.es: Doña Miriam de 26 años  y madre de 4 niños,quien únicamente curso el nivel primario  de escolaridad, por falta de recursos  en su familia, fue así  como ella  empezó a trabajar en la elaboración de delantales  los cuales son muy utilizadas por las mujeres indígenas fuera y dentro de su localidad, luego de casarse  inicio con su negocio propio el cual le ha ido bastante bien ya que gracias a Dios y al apoyo de su esposo logro adquirir  2 maquinas de coser, en lo que ella elabora su trabajo, ella solo realiza pedidos de varias personas donde ella se dio a conocer desde  soltera, ella solicita de capital para poder comprar materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos y algunos utensilios como agujas, aceite para darle mantenimiento a  sus maquinas, entre otros, y así poder seguir vendiendo  y percibir un ingreso sin salir de su casa donde puede atender a sus niños. Su meta es poder brindarle  trabajo a otras personas y vender por mayor  siendo así una mujer muy productiva y trabajadora.
texts.en:
Doña Miriam is 26 years old and the mother of four children. She was only able to finish her elementary school education because her family lacked the resources. As a result, she began making aprons that are widely used by the indigenous women who live outside and within her town. Miriam got married later and then started her own business, which has done quite well thanks to God and the support of her husband. She was able to acquire two sewing machines to use in her work. Miriam only works based on orders from different people who have known her since she was single.

She is requesting capital to buy raw materials for making woven articles and a few tools such as needles, oil for maintaining her machines, and other supplies. This will enable her to continue selling and generating income without having to leave her house so that she can look after her children. Her goals are to provide employment to other people, to sell in bulk, and to become a very productive and hardworking woman.

loans.use: to purchase materials and supplies for weaving.

loans.name: Segundo Nicolas

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 50 años vive en Machachi cerca de Latacunga junto con su esposa y sus tres hijos que tienen 17,15,12 años, se considera una persona de caracter fuerte y recto.

Trabala lustrando zapatos (limpiando zapatos) con sus esposa en el parque de Machachi tuvo su puesto en la asociación hace 2 años.

Es la primera vez que trabaja con FIDEMI, solicita el crédito para la compra de un puesto e la asociación para que ahí trabaje su mujer, gracias a este puesto tendrían un ingreso mas en su familia y mejoraría su calidad de vida.

Su sueño es incrementar su clientela para que le genere más ingresos y poder terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Segundo is 50 years old and lives in Machachi, which is near Latacunga, with his wife and three children (ages 17, 15, and 12). He is considered to be a person of strong and upright character.

He and his wife shine shoes at the park in Machachi. They have a post from the association where they have worked for two years.

This is the first time Segundo has worked with FODEMI. He is requesting a loan so that he can buy a location from the association so that he and his wife can continue to work. By having this location, they will be able to generate more income for their family and improve their quality of life.

Segundo dreams of attracting more customers so that he can generate more income and finish the construction of his house.

loans.use: to acquire a location for his shoeshine business.

loans.name: Presentacion

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal “Vamos Juntas” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco.  Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las nuevas siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”. 

En el lugar conocimos a la señora Presentación que nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú), tiene 55 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cinco hijos, y nos cuenta:

“Actualmente, Yo vivo en la ciudad donde nací y donde realizo mis actividades económicas, Yo me dedico a la elaboración de chicha de jora y la venta de bebidas alcohólicas, Yo tengo una pequeña picantería llamada “La Mamicha” y pertenezco a la Asociación de Picantería Virgen Santa Ana de la ciudad del Cusco. Ya es un año que me dedico a este negocio y me va muy bien. Este crédito es para comprar gaseosas y cervezas”.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Vamos Juntas” (We Go Together) meets every 30 days in the city of Cusco, which is known in the region for being a tourist and commercial area. It is also known for the traditional festival of Inti Raymi and for being the home of one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machu Picchu.

It is here that the staff of Asociación Arariwa met with Sra. Presentación, who was born in the city of Cusco in Peru. She is 55 years old, married, and has five children. Presentación said the following:

“At the moment, I live in the city where I was born and this is where I conduct my business. I make chicha de jora (a beverage made from corn) and sell alcoholic beverages. I operate a small restaurant called La Mamicha and am a member of the Picantería Virgen Santa Ana Association in the city of Cusco. I have been in this business for a year and am doing very well. I need a loan to buy sodas and beer.”

loans.use: to buy sodas and beer.

loans.name: Rosa Yasmin

texts.es:
Rosa, vive con sus padres y sus hijos, tiene una crianza de cerdos, este negocio surgió por su iniciativa y con la ayuda de sus padres lo instalo en su casa, no tiene horario fijo de trabajo para atender a sus clientes.
Ella esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerdos y concentrado para engordarlos, esta compra le permitirá crecer y ampliar su negocio para mejorar los ingresos.
Su sueño es tener un negocio mas grande, tener mas clientela, mejorar los ingreso y vivir feliz con su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa lives with her parents and her children. She has a business raising pigs, which has progressed because of her initiative and the help she received from her parents in establishing it at her home. Rosa does not work on a fixed schedule when attending to her customers.

She is requesting a loan to buy pigs and concentrated feed for fattening them. This purchase will allow her to grow and expand her business so that she can improve her earnings. Rosa dreams of having a larger business, acquiring more customers, improving her income, and living happily with her family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Akouvi Ayodélé

texts.fr:
Akouvi est une femme  âgée de 25 ans. Elle est mariée å un soudeur avec 01 enfant en charge. 
Akouvi travaille comme revendeuse de bijoux depuis 2007. Elle vend à tous clients au marché de N’KAFU. Elle achète les produits à COTONOU. 
Akouvi a requis son second cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des bijoux.
texts.en: Akouvi is a 25 year old woman and mother of one child who lives in Togo with her husband, a welder. She has been selling jewelry since 2007, mostly selling at the N'Kafu market. She purchases the jewelry in Cotonou. She is asking for a second loan from WAGES in order to purchase greater quantities of jewelry for her business.

loans.use: Purchase jewelry

loans.name: Gioconda Del Socorro

texts.es:
Gioconda soltera, madre sus hijos están estudiando, sus metas es que sus hijos se preparen profesionalmente. Mujer trabajadora, emprendedora tiene su propio negocio venta de cosméticos y variedad. Su vivienda muy humilde se le ha presentado dificultades como los efectos del invierno provocando inundaciones.
 El negocio lo inicio con fondo propios y para el mejoramiento económico de su estado de vida. Con el préstamo comprar mercadería como: pinturas labiales, de mano, sombra, vanidad, cremas, perfume, desodorantes entre otros productos.  Para cumplir con los pedidos y ofrecerle mayores variedades. Permitiendo obtener utilidades.
texts.en:
Gioconda is a single mother with school-age children. Her goals include helping her children to prepare themselves so that they can become professionals. She is a hardworking and enterprising woman who has her own business selling cosmetics and a variety of other products. Her modest home has presented her with difficulties, such as the after-effects caused by the winter flooding.

Gioconda started her business with her own funds so that she could improve her financial status in life. With this loan she will buy merchandise such as lipsticks, hand lotions, eye shadows, compacts, crèmes, perfumes, deodorants, and other products so that she can complete her orders and offer more variety. This will allow her to generate a profit.

loans.use: to purchase lipsticks, hand lotions, eye shadows, compacts, crèmes, perfumes, deodorants, and other products.

loans.name: Renzo Edemir

texts.es:
Renzo, vive con esposa y una hija, es casado, cría cerdos y trabaja en albañilería, el negocio lo aprendió en su casa ya que vive frente a un lugar donde compran, venden y matan cerdos, no tiene horario fijo en su negocio.
El esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerdos y concentrado para alimentarlos y engordarlos, esta compra le ayudara en crecer y ampliar el negocio.
Tiene por objetivo aumentar la granja, en numero de cerdos y en terreno, para que esten más comodos y que este crecimiento le traiga mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Renzo is married and lives with his wife and daughter. He raises pigs and also does masonry work. Renzo learned his business at home since he lives in front of a place that buys, sells, and butchers pigs. He does not work on a fixed schedule when running his business.

Renzo is requesting a loan to buy pigs and concentrated feed for their diet so that he can fatten them. This purchase will help to grow and expand his business.
